text:
sUdayantu tE || 
pRuqthiqvI tEq &ntari#kShENa vAqyuSCiqdraM Bi#Shajyatu | 
dyaustEq nakSha#traiH saqha rUqpaM kRu#NOtu sAdhuqyA ||
SaM tEq parE$ByOq gAtrE$ByaqH Samaqstvava#rEByaH | 
SamaqsthaByO# maqjjaByaqH Samu# tE taqnuvE# Buvat || 64
(vili#ShTaM - triq(gm)qSacca#) (A12)

Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 12 Anuvaakams :- 
(viShNu#muKAq - anna#patEq - yAva#tIq - vi vai - pu#ruShamAqtrENA - &gnEq tavaq SravOq vayOq - brahma# jaj~jAqna(gg) - sva#yamAtRuqNNA - mEqShAM ~Mvai - paqSu - rgA#yaqtrI - kastvAq - dvAda#Sa )

Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 Series of Panchaatis :-
(viShNu#muKAq - apa#citimAqnq - vi vA EqtA - vagnEq tava# - svayamAtRuqNNAM - ~Mvi#ShUqcInA#ni - gAyaqtrI - catu#ShShaShTiH)

First and Last Padam of Second Prasnam of 5th Kandam
(viShNu#muKA - staqnuvE# Buvat )

|| hari#H OM ||
|| kRuShNa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pa~jcamakANDE dvitIyaH praSnaH samAptaH ||
------------------------------------

OM namaH paramAtmanE, SrI mahAgaNapatayE namaH, SrI guruByO namaH
haqriqH OM

5.3	 pa~jcamakANDE tRutIyaH praSnaH - citInAM nirUpaNaM
